Int_t CErrnoException::ReasonCode (    )  const [virtual]
 

Return an integer valued code which indicates the reason for the exception. This value is exception type dependent. for CErrnoException, the value is the value of errno at the time the exception was instantiated.

Reimplemented from CException.

Definition at line 342 of file CErrnoException.cpp.

References m_nErrno.

const char * CErrnoException::ReasonText (    )  const [virtual]
 

Return the textual reason for the error. This is done by asking for the strerror of m_nErrno. Note therefore that the reason text returned relates to the value of errno at the time the exception was thrown, not the current time.

Reimplemented from CException.

Reimplemented in CTCPConnectionFailed, CTCPConnectionLost, and CTCPNoSuchService.
